content.title: Legal Deals
description: PracticePanther stands as a premier cloud-based law practice management software, catering to tens of thousands of legal professionals across 170 countries. With its intuitive and user-friendly interface, PracticePanther provides a comprehensive suite of features including case management, time tracking, billing, client intake, payment processing, calendaring, eSignature, and more, empowering lawyers to streamline and automate their practices. Schedule a demo and receive 10% off your first year of PracticePanther's annual Business Plan.
